result.title: Project Passport
result.conservativeEstimate: Conservative estimate based on typical project costs
result.disclaimer: All figures are preliminary estimates based on typical project costs
result.visualizationDisclaimer: Conceptual visualization â€” actual spaces and materials may vary

service.spacePlanningBudget: Standardized Basics. Application of generic layout rules. Focuses on the fastest, most obvious solutions to keep design time and complexity to a minimum.
service.spacePlanningStandard: Ergonomic Optimization. Flow optimized for specific lifestyle habits. Involves custom zoning and solving specific spatial challenges.
service.spacePlanningPremium: Complete spatial transformation. Includes moving walls, integrated joinery detailing, and advanced lighting architecture.
service.interiorFinishesBudget: Single-Source Selection. Materials selected from consolidated vendors. Optimizes design hours while ensuring a clean result.
service.interiorFinishesStandard: Cross-Supplier Curation. Textures matched across multiple specialized suppliers to create unique aesthetic depth.
service.interiorFinishesPremium: Unrestricted Sourcing. Global procurement scope. Includes rare natural materials, trade-only surfaces, and custom elements.
service.furnishingDecorBudget: Retail Specification. Selection of ready-to-ship, in-stock items from major retailers. Focuses on budget control.
service.furnishingDecorStandard: Semi-Custom Mix. Blends retail items with semi-custom selections. Includes fabric matching and dimension checks.
service.furnishingDecorPremium: Bespoke Commissioning. Specification of trade-only brands. Includes exact sizing, custom upholstery, and made-to-measure detailing.

cost.prepWorkTooltip: Demolition, waste removal, and surface preparation
